full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Title and Language**
* **English Title:** K8D10-230312 Thermistor Strings
* **French Title:** K8D10-230312 Câbles à thermistances

**Reference and Solicitation**
* **Reference Number:** WS3760843101
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3760843101
* **Publication Date:** 2022-11-29
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-12-21T14:00:00

**Updated Details**
* **Amendment Date:** 2022-11-29
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2022-12-28
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2023-05-31

**Notice Details**
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Commercial Conditions**
* **Trade Agreements:** *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None

**Contracting Entity**
* **Contracting Entity Name (English):** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Name (French):** Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* **Contact Information:**
  * **Name:** David Barltrop (SPAC/PSPC)
  * **Email:** david.barltrop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
  * **Phone:** None
  * **Fax:** None

**Notice URL**
* **English URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14764722?extsite=MTQ3NjQ3MjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* **French URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14764722?extsite=MTQ3NjQ3MjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Terms and Conditions**
The Canadian government invites offers from contractors for the procurement of Thermistor Strings and related equipment to the Department of the Environment (ECCC). The notice has an updated closing time, and all supporting documentation must be submitted by 14:00 HNE on 2022-12-21. The bid must include deliverables received on or before 2023-03-15.

**Note
